job_tasks.phrase: Configuring reusable template elements, called AI Controllers in several tools, most notably in ComfyUI
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to configuring and utilizing components within a generative AI workflow tool (ComfyUI), which is a form of model interaction and setup.

job_tasks.phrase: Using various image manipulation tools (both AI and traditional) to create the elements needed for controlling the AI (depth-maps, segmenters, refiners, various models and LoRas)
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation and preparation of specific AI components (depth-maps, segmenters, refiners, LoRas) which are integral to controlling and influencing generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: Support on and managing the training of customized models and LoRas
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions supporting and managing the training of models, a core aspect of the 'Modeling' task category.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients
job_tasks.justification: This implies the development and management of systems or workflows to ensure the AI outputs are controlled and meet quality standards for clients, touching on the application and integration of AI.

soft_skills.phrase: Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use and management of generative AI tools like ComfyUI and techniques such as LoRas, depth-maps, and refiners. It focuses on controlling AI for high visual quality outputs, aligning with the 'GenAI Engineer' profile's focus on designing and deploying applications built on generative models.
